Class CustomerScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.CustomerScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Class and method to add, update, and delete customer data.
